humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there are metastases in 2 out of 12 lymph nodes (2/12). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma involving two of twelve lymph nodes (2/12), which corresponds to N1 stage based on the AJCC 7th edition, 2010 staging system. The report explicitly states this in the pathologic diagnosis and breast pathologic parameters sections.
